data.title: On Air Schedule
data.meta_description: Monday-Friday Time Program 1:05am - 5:00am Coast-To-Coast AM with George Noory 5:05am - 5:30am America In the Morning with Jim Bohannon 5:30am - 8:45am
data.text:
Monday-Friday Time Program 1:05am – 5:00am Coast-To-Coast AM with George Noory 5:05am – 5:30am America In the Morning with Jim Bohannon 5:30am – 8:45am Augusta’s Morning News John Patrick, Mary Liz Nolan, and Chris Michaels 8:45am – 9:00am WGAC Business Review with John Patrick 9:05am – 12:00pm The Glenn Beck Progam 12:05pm – 3:00pm The Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show 3:05pm – 6:00pm The Austin Rhodes Show 6:00pm – 6:30pm The 6 O’Clock News with WJBF

6:30pm – 6:45pm The O’Reilly Update with Bill O’Reilly 6:45pm – 10:00pm The Mark Levin Show 10:05pm – 1:00am The Ramsey Show Saturday Time Program 6:05am – 7:00am The Augusta Golf Show With John Patrick 7:05am – 8:00am The Wallace and Sons Lawn & Garden Show 8:05am – 10:00am The C&C Automotive Car Care Show 10:05am – 1:00pm The Kim Komando Show 1:05 pm – 4:00pm The Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Week in Review 4:05pm – 7:00pm The Glenn Beck Program 7:05pm – 10:00pm Handel On The Law 10:05pm – 12:00pm Coast-To-Coast AM with George Noory Sunday Time Program 12:05am – 5:30am Coast-To-Coast AM with George Noory 5:30am – 6:00am The Lutheran Hour 6:00am – 7:30am Christ Church Presbyterian 7:30am – 8:00am The Lutheran Hour 8:05am – 11:00am The Kim Komando Show 11:00am – 12:00pm St. Paul’s Episcopal Church Service 12:05pm – 3:00pm The Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Week in Review 3:05pm – 4:00pm Augusta Golf Show With John Patrick 4:05pm – 5:00pm The Ramsey Show 5:05pm – 6:00pm Law Talk 6:05pm – 7:00pm The First Step With Judge David Watkins 7:05pm – 8:00pm The Kim Komando Show 8:05pm – 10:00pm The Motley Fool
